completed.name: Green Bay Packers at Detroit Lions

highlights.headline: Jordan Love heaves 51-yard TD pass to Christian Watson
highlights.description: Jordan Love throws a 51-yard touchdown pass to Christian Watson to extend the Packers' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NFL_One-Play (Jordan Love heaves 51-yard TD pass to Christian Watson) 2025/11/27 ESHEET

highlights.headline: Packers outlast Lions on Thanksgiving
highlights.description: Jordan Love throws four touchdown passes to lead the Packers to a 31-24 win over the Lions.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Final Game Highlight (Packers outlast Lions on Thanksgiving) 2025/11/27 ESHEET

headlines.description: â€” Jordan Love had plenty of time to pass, and took full advantage.
headlines.shortLinkText: Love matches career high with 4 TD passes, lifting Packers to 31-24 win over Lions

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Final Game Highlight (Packers outlast Lions on Thanksgiving) 2025/11/27 ESHEET

completed.name: Kansas City Chiefs at Dallas Cowboys

highlights.headline: Cowboys outlast Chiefs for pivotal Thanksgiving Day win
highlights.description: The Cowboys hold off the Chiefs 31-28 on Thanksgiving Day behind a massive day from Dak Prescott.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Cowboys outlast Chiefs for pivotal Thanksgiving Day win ) 2025/11/27 ESHEET

headlines.description: â€” Dak Prescott and the Dallas Cowboys still face long odds in trying to rally for a spot in the playoffs.
headlines.shortLinkText: Prescott's Cowboys overcome Mahomes' fourth-down magic in 31-28 Thanksgiving win over Chiefs

video.headline: Cowboys outlast Chiefs for pivotal Thanksgiving Day win

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Cowboys outlast Chiefs for pivotal Thanksgiving Day win ) 2025/11/27 ESHEET

highlights.headline: Bengals dominate on defense in Joe Burrow's return
highlights.description: Joe Burrow slings two touchdowns while the defense forces five turnovers in the Bengals' win over the Ravens on Thanksgiving.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Bengals dominate on defense in Joe Burrow's return) 2025/11/28 ESHEET SOTFULL

headlines.description: â€” Joe Burrow returned to the field and delivered a poised performance despite not playing since Week 2.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bengals win in Burrow's return, taking advantage of 5 Ravens turnovers in a 32-14 victory

video.headline: Bengals dominate on defense in Joe Burrow's return

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Bengals dominate on defense in Joe Burrow's return) 2025/11/28 ESHEET SOTFULL

highlights.headline: Bears get statement win vs. Eagles
highlights.description: The Chicago Bears defeat the Philadelphia Eagles on the road 24-15.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Final Game Highlight (Bears get statement win vs. Eagles) 2025/11/28 ESHEET

headlines.description: â€” After beating the Eagles on the Super Bowl champions' home turf, it was time for rookie Bears coach Ben Johnson to bare arms. Oh, and go bare-chested.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ben Johnson flexes shirtless in locker room after Bears' 5th straight win, 24-15 over reeling Eagles

video.headline: Bears get statement win vs. Eagles

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Final Game Highlight (Bears get statement win vs. Eagles) 2025/11/28 ESHEET
